"Cart-o-Matic": An AI-powered shopping cart that can identify and automatically apply coupons, discounts, and loyalty rewards to your purchases. It also provides personalized product recommendations based on your shopping history and preferences.

"ShopGenie": A virtual shopping assistant that can help you find the best deals and discounts on the items you want to buy. It can also provide you with a list of alternative products and brands that are similar to what you're looking for.

"PricePal": A shopping cart that can detect price drops and automatically notify you when the price of an item you've purchased before goes down. It can also provide you with a list of similar items that are currently on sale.

"CartChat": A social shopping platform that allows you to connect with other shoppers who have similar interests and preferences. You can share shopping lists, ask for recommendations, and even form shopping groups to split costs and make purchases together.

"StyleSavvy": A virtual shopping assistant that can help you find the perfect outfit based on your body type, style preferences, and the occasion. It can also provide you with a list of recommended products and brands that fit your budget and style.
